div.a: What The FBI Found When They Investigated Scientology

div.div: John Brousseau hadn't been seen for hours, not at the afternoon muster and not at the dinner break. That's when they got concerned. Two days later, Scientology's newest runaway was singing to the FBI.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X3ZRqP&via=Digg&text=What The FBI Found When They Investigated Scientology

div.a: MIT Launches Internal Investigation Into Its Role In Aaron Swartz's Prosecution

div.div: On Sunday, the Massachusetts Institute of Technology released a statement on the untimely death of digital activist and pioneer Aaron Swartz, offering condolences to his friends and family and announcing an investigation into the university's role in his prosecution.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZYyi8F&via=Digg&text=MIT Launches Internal Investigation Into Its Role In Aaron Swartz's Prosecution

div.a: Fastest Wi-Fi Ever Is Almost Ready For Real-World Use

div.div: In a quiet suite removed from the insanity of the Consumer Electronics Show expo floor, a company aiming to build the fastest Wi-Fi chips in the world demonstrated its vision of wireless technology's future.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXIQQ6&via=Digg&text=Fastest Wi-Fi Ever Is Almost Ready For Real-World Use

div.a: For God's Sake, Go Get A Flu Shot

div.div: Unfortunately, high flu season is the time when some of the smartest people I know act in the most irrational ways.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V5MKYm&via=Digg&text=For God's Sake, Go Get A Flu Shot

div.a: Why We Should Remember Aaron Swartz

div.div: Without the innovations of complicated, brilliant people like Swartz, no tech company would be making any money at all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RPtgHY&via=Digg&text=Why We Should Remember Aaron Swartz

div.a: Beijing's Horrifying Air Pollution Is 'Crazy Bad'

div.div: One Friday more than two years ago, an air-quality monitoring device atop the United States Embassy in Beijing recorded data so horrifying that someone in the embassy called the level of pollution “Crazy Bad” in an infamous Twitter post.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WPEx7I&via=Digg&text=Beijing's Horrifying Air Pollution Is 'Crazy Bad'

div.a: 7 Men Gang Rape Bus Passenger In India

div.div: In an incident eerily similar to a sexual assault that sent shock waves worldwide, Indian police say a woman was gang-raped over the weekend by seven men after she boarded a bus at night.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYAK9q&via=Digg&text=7 Men Gang Rape Bus Passenger In India

div.div: Someone taught this poor bird how to sing dubstep.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11sHWAL&via=Digg&text=Here's A Bird Singing Dubstep

div.a: Why You Should Never, Ever Use Two Spaces After A Period

div.div: Can I let you in on a secret? Typing two spaces after a period is totally, completely, utterly, and inarguably wrong.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/qJHGtY&via=Digg&text=Why You Should Never, Ever Use Two Spaces After A Period

div.div: Like other boys my age, I grew up with unlimited access to smut. At 23, I wonder if it's totally screwed me up.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W1bcI7&via=Digg&text=Did Porn Warp Me Forever?

div.a: Breaking The Long Distance Hang Gliding Record

div.div: The clouds stretched across the Texas sky like a highway. And soaring along those lanes, lofted nearly 8,000 feet by the hot air rising from the earth, two hang gliders raced in tight pursuit of the most prized feat in this high adrenaline niche sport: farthest ever flown.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VDS9qP&via=Digg&text=Breaking The Long Distance Hang Gliding Record

div.a: Life Of A Russian SWAT Team In Pictures

div.div: Here's a cool photo gallery of a Russian SWAT team training and hanging out over the holidays.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13oLaUr&via=Digg&text=Life Of A Russian SWAT Team In Pictures

div.a: The Greatest Frisbee Death Scene Ever

div.div: Presenting the best (only?) frisbee death scene in cinematic history, courtesy of 1987′s Hard Ticket to Hawaii.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ud0WxH&via=Digg&text=The Greatest Frisbee Death Scene Ever

div.div: COMES WITH HAPPINESS INDEX FOR RIDES

div.a: China's Unlicensed 'World Of Warcraft' Theme Park

div.div: This weekend Redditor FrancescaO_O paid a visit to Joyland, the World of Warcraft-themed park in China.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10slwAl&via=Digg&text=China's Unlicensed 'World Of Warcraft' Theme Park

div.a: Every Phone Should Have This Mode That Won't Blind You In The Dark

div.div: You know that feeling. You're in a dark room, maybe you just woke up, and you reach for your phone to check something and—BAM!—you're assaulted by its full brightness and effectively blind and squinting for the next 30 seconds. Microsoft has a potential fix for that.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V4ZHSi&via=Digg&text=Every Phone Should Have This Mode That Won't Blind You In The Dark

div.a: The Business Of Girl Scout Cookies

div.div: Thin mints are clearly the biggest money maker.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V1SD95&via=Digg&text=The Business Of Girl Scout Cookies

div.div: ROBOTS ARE THE NEW MIDDLE CLASS

div.a: 10 Reasons Why 2013 Will Be The Year You Quit Your Job

div.div: The myth of corporate safety, of rising up through the ranks, of getting the gold watch, of getting applauded by your peers is over. Not because the economy is bad. But because innovation and the global economy are better than ever.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UZqQZH&via=Digg&text=10 Reasons Why 2013 Will Be The Year You Quit Your Job

div.a: How True Believers Radicalized The NRA

div.div: In gun lore it’s known as the Revolt at Cincinnati. On May 21, 1977, and into the morning of May 22, a rump caucus of gun rights radicals took over the annual meeting of the National Rifle Association.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xu0cF4&via=Digg&text=How True Believers Radicalized The NRA

div.a: Entire 'Toy Story' Movie Remade With Actual Toys

div.div: The amount of time and energy required to make this is mind boggling.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11qboaC&via=Digg&text=Entire 'Toy Story' Movie Remade With Actual Toys

div.div: This is how you make an ice rink.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W0IgQr&via=Digg&text=How Ice Rinks Are Made

div.a: The Right-Hand Man Of Steve Jobs Has Broken His Silence

div.div: James Higa, a former Apple vice president who describes his job there as "special ops for Steve"—Steve Jobs, that is—recently gave an interview.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UIFnnd&via=Digg&text=The Right-Hand Man Of Steve Jobs Has Broken His Silence
